% Reduced mobilities, as a function of E/N, taken from 
% Ellis et al, Atomic data and nuclear data tables, 17, 177-210 (1976)
% O2+ mobility in O2
% First column: E/N in Td
% Second column: reduced mobility in SI (m-1 V-1 s-1)
